definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: inquire, cause to swell or boil up (NH id; Ar. bagay seek, suppurate, swell; Aram. [[בְּעָא]], b9o0 seek)—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of rising desire, seek, inquire, abs., of inquiring of prophet Is 21:12, Is 21:12.
cause to boil up, [[־אֵשׁ]]´[[מַיִם תִּב]] Is 64:1 (but gloss Che).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִבְעוּ]] Ob:Ob 6 searched out (‖[[נֶחְפְּשׂוּ]]); Pt. [[נִבְעֶה]] Is 30:13 swelling, swelling out (of decaying wall; Di swelling, enlarging, of crack in wall).
